plugin.name: DenonAvpControl
plugin.title: Denon AVP/AVR Control
plugin.desc: This plugin will control a network ready Denon AVP/AVR from the Logitech Media Server or Squeezebox. The plugin will turn the Denon device on/off, adjust and synchronize the volumes, and set the Denon audio modes. Settings in each player.
plugin.creator: Chris Couper
